events.name: St. Louis Blues at Pittsburgh Penguins

headlines.description: — Sidney Crosby had a goal and two assists to become the ninth player in NHL history with 1,700 points and the Pittsburgh Penguins beat the St. Louis Blues 6-3 on Monday night.
headlines.shortLinkText: Crosby has goal, 2 assists to reach 1,700 points as Penguins beat Blues 6-3

headlines.description: — Drake Batherson and Tim Stutzle each had two goals and an assist to lead the Ottawa Senators over the Boston Bruins 7-2 on Monday night for their third straight win.
headlines.shortLinkText: Batherson and Stutzle score twice to lift the Senators over Bruins 7-2
